item.title: Call to help
item.author: defconrussia@gmail.com (Russian DEF CON group: DC7812)
item.description: We are looking for a WEB designer and content-manager (admin) who wants to contribute to the community and create a lot of cool things!

item.title: Site: Reborn

item.description: We f*cked up. Lost our web content and everything. Welcome!
